episodes.title: Defected Presents The Interview with House Master Frankie Knuckles
episodes.description: In September 2011, Defected Records' Simon Dunmore met Frankie Knuckles, The Godfather of House. During the interview that followed they spoke about Frankie's life, career and the past, present and future of house music. Here is just a taste of that full length interview.
